= Notes on the Data Set =

This is a defect data set with defect reports as well as the sequences after data pre-processing:
  * A tutorial on defect prediction can be found [http://code.google.com/p/promisedata/wiki/ShortTutorialOnDefectPrediction here].
  * Information about the data set and the related manuscript can be found [http://www.cais.ntu.edu.sg/~nchen1/SPE.htm here].
